GULF OF MEXICO.
FLORIDA.
DNC 15.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED ON 406 MHZ FROM
28 FOOT VESSEL, YELLOW HULL, IN VICINITY
29-36.93N 087-00.87W AT 062020Z OCT.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED
TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO RCC NEW ORLEANS,
PHONE: 855 485 3727, FAX: 504 589 2148,
E-MAIL: D8COMMANDCENTER@USCG.MIL
